step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, with the right shoulder showing excellent alignment. Try to keep your left shoulder a bit closer to the target. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.

Your right shoulder and elbow are well-aligned. For the left side, aim to bring your elbow slightly closer to the target. Continue to focus on the circular motion, squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.

Your right shoulder and elbow are very close to the target. For the left side, try to bring your elbow a little closer. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow.
